select.name: S_PTRA_CTASPADRE
select.instruction: SELECT DISTINCT CONS_ACCT_NUM, CONS_TYP_CD TIPO_CTA FROM MOBDVM A, MERCADO_PREFIX_DB2.TCUST_ADDR B WHERE A.MKT_ID = '?' AND A.ACCT_NUM = ? AND B.MKT_ID = A.MKT_ID AND B.ACCT_NUM = A.ACCT_NUM AND B.ADDR_TYP_CD = 'CU' AND B.USER_SEQ_NUM = 0

select.name: S_TIC_DES_VALUSER
select.instruction: SELECT MKT_ID, ACCT_NUM, SERV_CSR_ID FROM MOBDVM WHERE MKT_ID = '?' AND (ACCT_TYP_CD IN ('CO','MA','MG','CM') OR (ACCT_TYP_CD='DI' AND BILL_CYC_ID='20')) AND ACCT_NUM IN (?)

select.name: S_TRAN_RESPAGO
select.instruction: SELECT DISTINCT REG.MKT_ID AS REG, REG.ACCT_NUM AS CTA_REG, REG.CONS_TYP_CD AS TIPO_CTA, REG.BILL_RESP_IND AS RESPONS, REG.ACCT_STAT_CD AS ESTATUS, NAC.REGN_ACCT_NUM AS CTA_NAC FROM ( SELECT MKT_ID, ACCT_NUM, CONS_TYP_CD, BILL_RESP_IND, ACCT_STAT_CD FROM MOBDVM WHERE MKT_ID = '?' AND ACCT_NUM = ? ) REG LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REGN_ACCT_NUM, BUS_MKT_ID, ACCT_NUM FROM CORP_PREFIX_DB2.TREGN_CUST_RELTN WHERE MKT_ID = 'CPT' ) NAC ON (NAC.ACCT_NUM = REG.ACCT_NUM OR NAC.REGN_ACCT_NUM = REG.ACCT_NUM) AND NAC.BUS_MKT_ID = REG.MKT_ID

select.name: S_TRAN_RESPAGO_IN
select.instruction: SELECT DISTINCT REG.MKT_ID AS REG, REG.ACCT_NUM AS CTA_REG, REG.CONS_TYP_CD AS TIPO_CTA, REG.BILL_RESP_IND AS RESPONS, REG.ACCT_STAT_CD AS ESTATUS, NAC.REGN_ACCT_NUM AS CTA_NAC FROM ( SELECT MKT_ID, ACCT_NUM, CONS_TYP_CD, BILL_RESP_IND, ACCT_STAT_CD FROM MOBDVM WHERE MKT_ID = '?' AND ACCT_NUM IN(?) ) REG LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REGN_ACCT_NUM, BUS_MKT_ID, ACCT_NUM FROM CORP_PREFIX_DB2.TREGN_CUST_RELTN WHERE MKT_ID = 'CPT' ) NAC ON (NAC.ACCT_NUM = REG.ACCT_NUM OR NAC.REGN_ACCT_NUM = REG.ACCT_NUM) AND NAC.BUS_MKT_ID = REG.MKT_ID

select.name: S_PTRA_VALIDA_USR
select.instruction: SELECT MKT_ID, ACCT_NUM, SERV_CSR_ID FROM MOBDVM WHERE MKT_ID = '?' AND (ACCT_TYP_CD IN ('CO','MA','MG','CM') OR (ACCT_TYP_CD='DI' AND BILL_CYC_ID='20')) AND ACCT_NUM = ?

select.name: S_PTRA_CONSTRANS
select.instruction: SELECT T.IDBANCO, T.FECHA, T.IMPORTE, T.REFERENCIABANCO, T.REFERENCIACLIENTE, B.NOMBRE FROM TRA_TRANSFERENCIA T, TRA_BANCO B WHERE T.FECHA >= TO_DATE ('?', 'DD-MM-YYYY') AND T.FECHA < TO_DATE ('?', 'DD-MM-YYYY') AND T.IDBANCO = ? AND T.ID_REGION=? AND T.IDBANCO = B.IDBANCO ORDER BY T.IDTRANSFERENCIA

select.name: S_PTRA_VALCARGA
select.instruction: SELECT * FROM SIPAB_PARAMSCONEXION WHERE APLICACION='TIC' AND SERVIDOR='CARGATRANS' AND TIPO='AC'

select.name: S_PTRA_VALEDO
select.instruction: SELECT IDESTATUS, IDEMPLEADO, ALIAS FROM TRA_TRANSFERENCIA WHERE IDTRANSFERENCIA=?
